conversations.body_text: ​Hi Paulo Franca ,     I noticed that your device is running firmware version v1.8.0, which suggests the firmware has been updated to the latest version. However, it seems you're not using the compatible SIMSONN Manager 2.0.7.  Please download and test it using the link below:      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hi There,

I didnt update anything. Do you mean the customer might have tried to update the firmware and that’s the reason the control box is not working?


Paulo Franca

USA:+1 949 508 0061

Skype: miumarunner

________________________________

Hi Paulo Franca       Firmware version v1.8.0 is only compatible with SIMSONN Manager 2.0.7, which offers a better user experience. Please give it a try. Note: This is not just a firmware update — after upgrading, the older Simconfigpedals V4 will no longer be supported.

Got it!
I will give a try today.
Could you share the instructions how to upgrade the firmware to 1.80?


Paulo Franca

USA:+1 949 508 0061

Skype: miumarunner

________________________________

Hi ​paulo  Please check if there is a button on the control box that can be pressed. If there is, press and hold the button while reconnecting the USB cable to enter recovery mode. If there's no button, you can go directly to the firmware update section in Simsonn Manager and manually select the plus.dfu or v1.8.0.sfu file from the pedals folder to perform the update.

Hi paulo     Currently, only the PlusX and ProX Ultra control units support the VAM or VAM Pro motors. You’ll need to purchase the PlusX control box, a dedicated 24V power supply, and the VAM Pro motor separately. ,  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor     You can upgrade to our latest software, SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.8. After launching the software, go to the settings menu and manually update the firmware by selecting the firmware-pedals-plus.sfu file. Once the upgrade is complete, you’ll be able to access the new configuration features in the updated software.     https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
